text: Hello Guian.  So sorry I've been off the radar.  My mummy has been unwell and I've been up in Scotland. She's doing much better now, but gave me a bit of a fright.  How are things with you?  Isobel says she's emailed you.  Did you get the message OK?  If so, are you able to get back to her?  Thanks.  Lucy

Hello I'm <http://glad.to|glad.to> hear your Mummy is doing well. I am very well and just preparing my UCAS application. I did the email from Isobel unfortunately I didn't see it until today I will respond quickly.
